```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(ggtext)
```


```{r}
readxl::read_excel("tabela_uy.xlsx") |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  mutate(ing_ativo = str_to_lower(ing_ativo)) -> uy_table
```


```{r}
uy_table |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = volumenes_cif_en_us, color = ing_ativo)) +
  geom_line(show.legend = FALSE) +
  facet_wrap(~ing_ativo)
```
